name: Flying Bomb - free flap flappy flying bomb as bird
name_original: Flying Bomb - free flap flappy flying bomb as bird
description:
You know this game ,,it is excited and fun.

> Tap to flap your wings and fly,
> If the Bomb Hit the Cactus , it explode!
> Look Carefully , the Cactuses are not All the Same!
> It is HARDER!
> Good new is that Snow White is waiting in 100

This app was not created or endorsed by "GEARS Studio", creators of "Flappy Bird"
